advancements.turorudi.get_milk_bucket.de: Start your dairy journey with milk
advancements.turorudi.get_cherry.title: Tastes just like a cherry
advancements.turorudi.get_lemon.title: Is just another lemon... bush?
advancements.turorudi.root.title: TuroRudi
item.turorudi.alexandrov_souffle: B.YU. Alexandrov souffle in dark chocolate
item.turorudi.alexandrov_souffle_milk: B.YU. Alexandrov souffle in milk chocolate
item.turorudi.corenovka_lemon_lime: Cow from Corenovka with lemon and lime
item.turorudi.pottyos_milk: Pöttyös Túró Rudi in milk chocolate
guide.title: TuroBook
guide.landing_text: A book about curd snacks and everything related to them, including recipes
blocks.turorudi.guide.name: Blocks
blocks.turorudi.guide.description: Learn all about blocks in this mod!
blocks.turorudi.milk_fat_block.guide: Its properties are very similar to the slime block. Crafted with 9 Milk Fat.
blocks.turorudi.turorudi_bad_block.guide: Lots of bad curd snack. Perhaps this is a culling from some dairy plant... It looks and smells not very good.
blocks.turorudi.turorudi_block.guide: Veeery big curd snack. You probably won't be able to eat that much curd snack...
items.turorudi.guide.name: Items
items.turorudi.guide.description: Learn all about items in this mod!
items.turorudi.apricot.guide: An interesting fruit. Can be found on apricot bushes in warm biomes (for example: jungle or savanna)
items.turorudi.banana.guide: It is loved by Conn... monkeys and minions. Grows on palm trees growing on beaches near warm biomes.
items.turorudi.blueberry.guide: Pretty tasty wild berry. Grows on bushes in the taiga. It differs from sweet berries in color. Bushes are thorny!
items.turorudi.caramel.guide: Burnt sugar in the furnace. Used in many confectionery products. Quite edible.
items.turorudi.cherry.guide: The most common cherry. Dropped from the leaves of cherry trees that grow in all biomes of the game.
items.turorudi.chocolate.guide: One of the criteria for glazed curds. For good curd snack, it is important that it is natural, and not made from milk fat. All types of chocolate can be seen below.
items.turorudi.coconut.guide: A unique fruit that grows only on the coconut tree that grows on beaches near warmer biomes. Inside it is delicious coconut milk, which is why it is valued among lovers of tasty treats.
items.turorudi.curd.guide: Fermented milk... At the same time, a milk-containing product without milk fat, produced in accordance with the technology for the production of curd, is called not curd, but a curd product (bad curd).
items.turorudi.glaze.guide: In a sense, an alternative to chocolate in curd snacks. Currently used in curds "Svitlogorie"
items.turorudi.lemon.guide: Very sour yellow citrus. Grows on lemon bushes in warm biomes. Weak to eat?
items.turorudi.lime.guide: Sour citrus bright green. Grows on lime bushes in warm biomes. Someone like to drink some drinks with him...
items.turorudi.milk_condensed_bucket.gui: Milk with high sugar content. Very tasty and sweet (logically). Has some heal properties. Just try to dip into it and you will immediately feel a little better...
items.turorudi.milk_fat.guide: An integral part of delicious curd snack. Adds softness in taste and milky notes to it.
items.turorudi.orange.guide: Delicious orange citrus that grows on trees in warm biomes (for example: jungle or savannah)
items.turorudi.turorudi.guide: It looks like curd snack without chocolate, but it's not it yet. But you can try if you're impatient. Just check if it's a good base...
turorudi.turorudi.guide.name: Curd snacks
turorudi.turorudi.guide.description: What yummy do I want today?
turorudi.turorudi.alexandrov.guide.name: B. YU. Alexandrov
turorudi.turorudi.alexandrov.guide: Probably the most famous of all cheeses in the CIS countries... This cheese is famous for its taste and expensive packaging (and price). Various variations of cheese and their crafts can be seen below.
turorudi.turorudi.corenovka.guide.name: Cow from Corenovka
turorudi.turorudi.corenovka.guide: Curd snack dispersed at the Korenovsky dairy plant in Russia. Good quality, but quite expensive.
turorudi.turorudi.pottyos.guide.name: Pöttyös Túró Rudi
turorudi.turorudi.pottyos.guide: Cult curd snack. You may have noticed, but the mod is named after him. It has a distinctive tubular shape.
turorudi.turorudi.preobrajenskiy.guide: Curd snack from the Russian dairy plant "Preobrajenskiy". He was rather suspicious because of his slogans and low prices. By itself, it is of reduced quality and too sweet. Also has a premium variant, which turned out to be not much better...
turorudi.turorudi.svitlogorie.guide.name: Svitlogorie
turorudi.turorudi.svitlogorie.guide: One of the best cheese curds in the CIS in terms of quality comes from Belarus (according to statements). It has many varieties and even collaborations (they are not here ...). Fun fact: this is the very first cheese in this mod and the author's favorite cheese.
turorudi.turorudi.vkusnoteevo.guide.name: Vkusnoteevo
turorudi.turorudi.vkusnoteevo.guide: The best CIS cheese according to Izzy Laif... I mean... One of the best cheeses in the CIS in terms of quality. They say it's delicious... Here
turorudi.turorudi.vologosha.guide.name: Vologosha
turorudi.turorudi.vologosha.guide: Cheese from the Vologda region of Russia, which is famous for its dairy products (and Santa Claus...). To be honest, this curd snack is so-so... The Vologosha brand is also known as a manufacturer of delicious milkshakes.
welcome.turorudi.guide.name: Hello!
welcome.turorudi.guide.description: A small greeting and description of the mod!
welcome.turorudi.mod_description.guide: So what is this mod about? This mod will add everyone's favorite curd snacks to your game. Curd snacks can give you different effects, depending on their filling (you can read about all the fillings below). But be careful, not all curds are of good quality and can give unwanted effects...
welcome.turorudi.thanks.guide.name: Thanks
welcome.turorudi.thanks.guide: Thanks for downloading this small mod. :)
